general.quota: The day you think you have nothing left to learn is the day you become an ignorant.

content.professionalInfo: I'm a systems engineer graduated from the Universidad del Valle, proficient in the command of the English language, with knowledge and experience in some programming languages such as Python, JavaScript, C#, C++, Java, Ruby and Elixir. And frameworks such as React, NodeJS, Django, Flask, Phoenix, and Rails. I have experience using version control software like Git and remote version control hosting platforms such as GitHub, virtualization technologies such as docker, docker-compose, and virtual machines, and networking concepts with useful applications when working with containerized applications. I'm actively looking for new concepts and technologies to learn so I can apply them in a near future, help people find the best solution for their problems, and also use them in my own.
content.personalInfo: I'm a cat lover, I have two cats, Pyro the crazy orange one (aka the midnight demon) and Asteri, the spoiled one (aka the love seeker). I play dnd every sunday with my friends from Argentina, Spain and other cities in Colombia, currently I am playing with a fighter because my cleric died in the hands of a one-eyed demon. Also, I love music, I cannot imagine a day without music, and I have learned to enjoy all the genres (almost), from pop, to metal, from hip-hop, to ballads, from R&B to punk, from classical to techno, and go on, I do am the guy that can listen and enjoy any good piece of music independant of its genre, part of that came from OSU! a rithm game, with mainly korean and japanese music. I think of myself as a creative person, who is constantly looking to start new projects, sometimes struggles finishing them, but I'm working on that.
